text: Great Place! Coffee is always good. For pleasure or business I go to Caffe Cucine.
author: Tom P

text: I saw your ad on Facebook and decided after church we would stop in and try your bagels. They were very good and made to order, they were made on site. We saw fresh bread that came out of the oven and we could not resist. The place is nice and clean and we were treated wery well. I took a menu and after we looked it over we decided we have to go for lunch, everything looks good and also clean. You can't go wrong, there is something for everyone. We were glad to find this place and will tell our friends.
author: Anna S

text: Good, wholesome food for reasonable prices and excellent service. Plenty of accommodations.
author: Jon w

text: Great Place! Coffee is always good. For pleasure or business I go to Caffe Cucine.
author: Tom P

subhead: Caffe Nelle Cucine offers some of the best fresh baked pastries in Warren County. Baked here on premise, we take care in using only the best ingredients in our desserts and baked goods. Our full time professional baker takes the time to hand craft beautiful pastries for our shop. We offer many different items on any given day ranging from Italian desserts, to country pies, to New York style pastries. Stop in today to check out our full assortment, as well as talk to our baker about any special orders you may have. We accept orders for special occasions such as birthday parties, weddings, communions, or any other get together. Contact our baker Sam at sam@caffenellecucine.com.
text: Great Place! Coffee is always good. For pleasure or business I go to Caffe Cucine.
